io.scanbot.sdk.ui.camera

Interface IScanbotCameraView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScanbotCameraView, ScanbotCameraXView

    public IScanbotCameraView

    • Method Detail

      • addFrameHandler

        void addFrameHandler(@NotNull
                     FrameHandler frameHandler)

        Used to add frame handler that will be called on each next frame

      • removeFrameHandler

        void removeFrameHandler(@NotNull
                        FrameHandler frameHandler)

        Unregisters interface FrameHandler.

        Parameters:
        frameHandler - handler to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothing happens.
        See Also:
        interface FrameHandler

      • setPreviewMode

        void setPreviewMode(@NotNull
                    CameraPreviewMode mode)

        Set the camera preview mode. By default - CameraPreviewMode.FILL_IN.

        Parameters:
        mode -

        • camera preview mode

      • takePicture

        void takePicture(boolean acquireFocus)

        Takes picture.

        Parameters:
        acquireFocus - {@code true} to perform auto-focus before shooting. {@code false} to shoot as fast as possible using current camera state.

      • addPictureCallback

        void addPictureCallback(@NotNull
                        PictureCallback pictureCallback)

        Adds callback which will be notified when picture will be taken. Callbacks are invoked on a worker thread, so you can safely perform "heavy" operations here.

        Parameters:
        pictureCallback - callback to register. Must not be null. If this callbackwas already added, nothing happens.

      • removePictureCallback

        void removePictureCallback(@NotNull
                           PictureCallback pictureCallback)

        Removes callback, so it won't receive any further notifications.

        Parameters:
        pictureCallback - callback to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothinghappens.

      • setCameraOpenCallback

        void setCameraOpenCallback(@NotNull
                           CameraOpenCallback cameraOpenCallback)

        Callback which will be invoked when camera will be opened

        Parameters:
        cameraOpenCallback - callback

      • addCameraStateCallback

        void addCameraStateCallback(@NotNull
                            CameraStateCallback cameraStateCallback)

        Adds callback which will be notified about camera state changes. Callbacks are invoked on a main thread.

        Parameters:
        cameraStateCallback - callback to register. Must not be null. If this callbackwas already added, nothing happens.

      • removeCameraStateCallback

        void removeCameraStateCallback(@NotNull
                               CameraStateCallback cameraStateCallback)

        Removes callback, so it won't receive any further notifications.

        Parameters:
        cameraStateCallback - callback to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothinghappens.

      • addTakePictureCallback

        void addTakePictureCallback(@NotNull
                            CameraTakePictureCallback cameraTakePictureCallback)

        Adds callback which will be notified about take picture operation process. Callbacks are invoked on a main thread.

        Parameters:
        cameraTakePictureCallback - callback to register. Must not be null. If this callbackwas already added, nothing happens.

      • removeTakePictureCallback

        void removeTakePictureCallback(@NotNull
                               CameraTakePictureCallback cameraTakePictureCallback)

        Removes callback, so it won't receive any further notifications.

        Parameters:
        cameraTakePictureCallback - callback to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothinghappens.

      • setAutoFocusOnTouch

        void setAutoFocusOnTouch(boolean autoFocusOnTouch)
        Parameters:
        autoFocusOnTouch - if true - auto focus on touch will be enabled, false - otherwise.By default this feature is enabled.

      • autoFocus

        void autoFocus()

        Performs auto-focus.

        If there is no auto-focus capabilities on this device, does nothing.

        If view is paused, this call is ignored.

      • continuousFocus

        void continuousFocus()

        Cancels auto-focus and performs continuous-focus. Should be executed from the main thread and when camera is opened

        If there is no continuous-focus capabilities on this device, does auto-focus.

        If view is paused, this call is ignored.

      • useFlash

        void useFlash(boolean useFlash)

        Enables or disables camera flash.

        If there is no flash on this device, does nothing.

        If view is paused, this call is ignored.

        Parameters:
        useFlash - true to enable flash. false to disable flash.

      • lockToPortrait

        void lockToPortrait(boolean lockPicture)

        Locks camera in portrait mode

        Parameters:
        lockPicture - if true - taken picture will ba locked to the portrait orientation,false - picture orientation depends on the device sensor.

      • lockToLandscape

        void lockToLandscape(boolean lockPicture)

        Locks camera in landscape mode

        Parameters:
        lockPicture - if true - taken picture will ba locked to the landscape orientation,false - picture orientation depends on the device sensor.

      • unlockOrientation

        void unlockOrientation()

        Unlocks camera orientation
